2023.title: Anotherblock
2023.description: Built the frontend for a music NFT marketplaceâ€”integrating Ethereum smart contracts with ethers.js and GraphQL for real-time on-chain data.

2023.description: Won the DAO & Community track at ETH Denver (600+ teams). Built a knowledge management tool with Notion-like commands for on-chain data.

2023.title: Bonsai pivot to portfolio tracking
2023.description: Pivoted Bonsai into a unified portfolio dashboard: track crypto, stocks, real estate, and collectibles in one place with automated sync and real-time insights.

2022.title: Bonsai Finance pre-alpha
2022.description: Launched app.bonsai.finance as a Web3 dashboard for Ethereum assets and NFTs. Later evolved into Bonsaiâ€”a portfolio tracker for crypto, stocks, real estate, and collectibles at bonsai.finance.

2019.title: Mindler â€” first full-time role
2019.description: Joined as one of the first three developers at the med-tech startup. Worked across React, Node.js, and React Native; led the psychologist dashboard for 200+ professionals; helped scale the team to 20+ engineers.

2018.title: OnChain Jobs
2018.description: Co-founded OnChain Jobs with a childhood friend to connect blockchain companies with developers. Built the product while learning JavaScript.

2017.title: Smart contracts & first steps in code
2017.description: After buying my first NFT, I saw the potential of Ethereum and smart contracts. Taught myself programming and built HashDrop, a site that tracked token launches.
